dublin_core.dcvalue: Engage TB is a self-screening mobile application for tuberculosis. Participants do TB screening and access basic health information and TB prevention education via SMS messaging. The application also provides a list of health facilities that have the capability to do laboratory testing to confirm TB.
Mustafa Kudrati, Pathfinder, Email: mkudrati@pathfinder.org | Marion McNabb, Pathfinder, Email: mmcnabb@pathfinder.org
Client education and behavior change communication, Electronic decision support, Tuberculosis
